mods.abstract: Francis (Frank) Marion Adkins and wife, Ida Texas Arkansas Rhinehart, in front of their house with family and friends. The house was built be Jeff Garrett and bought be Frank Adkins. He later sold the house to Riley Darnell and his wife, Lula Riggins. Left to right, the family members pictured are Francis M. Adkins, Ida T. Rhinehart Adkins, Wiley Adkins, unnamed woman (friend and seamstress), Nettie Adkins, Una Pearl Adkins, Grover Cleveland Adkins, Hardy Adkins.
